Articles.Content:
I've launched a kerbal into orbit and set them for an EVA to collect science. However, when trying to board the vessel again, the kerbal is still apparently on the ladder outside. I do however still have SAS on the ship as the game thinks the kerbal is inside. I've looked through the internet and people have answered this query but I cannot replicate their results.

Tips I found:
 - Switch to another vessel
 - Quicksave
 - Quicksave with a name
 - Open the named quicksave in notepad
 - Edit something or another that deletes the EVA kerbal

This bug occurs in unmodded KSP as well but here are all of the mods I have installed:
 - Kerbal Attachment System
 - Kerbal Inventory System
 - Planetary Base Inc
 - Boomsticks Rev3
 - BD Armoury

Any help is appreciated
                     Khip
